job_history.role_name: RN / ASST. HEAD NURSE PRACTICE LEADER
job_history.work_description: Responsible for management of Unit on 24 hr basis including staffing, scheduling, and payroll. Monitor staff of RN's, NCT's, and Unit Clerks for daily assignments on going learning needs, and occasionally fill staff RN voids.

Started nursing career as RN on general Med / Surg Unit for 2 years. Recruited by MD Chairman of Oncology to be part of staff to open 1st Oncology inpatient Unit. Promoted also to Assistant Head Nurse.

Responsible for computer profiency and scheduling staff to Computer Classes and monitoring their progress in daily charting on patients. Attended workshops to learn computer scheduling and payroll duties.

Hired as ADON for an 85 to 90 bed long term care of Mentally and Physically disabled children from 2 years to upper 20's with a few older individuals. My job there included staffing of all the nurses monthly, setting up transportation for all outside MD office visits of the residents, monitoring the 3 nursing units of day to day care and documentation of the residents, taking call as needed and twice a month being MOD for the entire building.

Secured a Home Health position at ResCare located in Oak Park Illinois in 2015. I made home visits overseeing clients overall health. Did basic assessments and listened for any new complaints or change of status.
Secured an RN position in July 2016 at Best Home Health where I did home visits part time.
Worked for Maxim Home Health asking for part time for Infusion cases.

Started out as a Supervisor but was promoted to DCD managing a 40 bed Locked Dementia Unit and later a 60 bed Long Term Care Unit and recently back to the Dementia Unit along with the Long Term Care Unit.

skills.name: Nursing
skills.explanation: Over 40 years of experience in various nursing roles, including RN, Assistant Head Nurse, and Director of Care Delivery, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Held multiple leadership positions, including Assistant Head Nurse, Practice Leader, and Director of Care Delivery, demonstrating expert-level leadership skills.

skills.name: Staff Management
skills.explanation: Managed staff of RN's, NCT's, and Unit Clerks, including staffing, scheduling, and payroll, indicating expert-level staff management skills.

skills.name: Patient Care
skills.explanation: Provided care to patients in various settings, including hospitals, long-term care facilities, and home health, demonstrating expert-level patient care skills.

skills.name: Computer Proficiency
skills.explanation: Attended workshops to learn computer scheduling and payroll duties, and monitored staff progress in daily charting, showing a solid working proficiency in computer skills.

skills.name: Scheduling
skills.explanation: Scheduled staff to computer classes and monitored their progress, demonstrating a solid working proficiency in scheduling.

skills.name: Payroll Management
skills.explanation: Handled payroll duties as part of leadership roles, showing a solid working proficiency in payroll management.

skills.name: Documentation
skills.explanation: Monitored and maintained documentation of residents' care, demonstrating a solid working proficiency in documentation.
